author: Paul Brody
title: The Dark Times Are Here. Where Is Bitcoin?
description: Bitcoin was created for a moment like this. But so far it is missing its mark, says Paul Brody, head of blockchain at EY.
content: Bitcoin emerged in the darkness of the global financial crisis in 2008. The Bitcoin white paper represented a genuine breakthrough in thinking about coordinating complex systems in a decentralized en… [+4219 chars]
